voice_instruct: Young man, late 20s, deep baritone with raw emotional intensity. Kendrick Lamar's introspective flow meets Jeff Buckley's aching vulnerability. Capable of rapid-fire spoken word verses that shift into soaring, yearning vocal hooks. Carries the weight of depression and survivor's guilt but channels it into defiant hope. Bridge Four crew energy in group vocal sections.

tracks.title: Shattered Plains (The Long March)
tracks.prompt: post-rock hip-hop soul fusion, verse: Kendrick Lamar introspective rap over minimal tremolo guitar and delayed bass, slow build, 85 BPM boom-bap drums with reverse reverb, chorus: Explosions in the Sky crescendo with layered male vocals soaring over wall of distorted guitars and crashing cymbals, emotional dynamic contrast, male vocals raw and vulnerable
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
Carrying bridges on broken backs,
Fifteen men deep in the cracks
Of a world that only wants us flat,
Chasm duty, yeah they sent us at
The worst of it, the dirt of it,
Every scar a sermon and I'm learning it,
That gravity don't pull you down,
It's the weight you carry from your hometown,
Tiam, brother, I still hear your name
Echoing through the highstorm rain,
They branded me, slave to the pain,
But scars don't get to write the refrain,

[chorus]
I will protect those who cannot protect themselves,
I will protect even those I hate,
Through the storm, through the storm,
We carry the weight,
Bridge Four, Bridge Four,
We carry the weight,

[verse 2]
Depression like a highstorm ceiling,
Pressing down on every feeling,
Syl a whisper when the dark is reeling,
Honorable lies versus honest healing,
I jumped, yeah I jumped from that ledge,
Not to fly but to find the edge
Of what a man becomes when pledge
Meets purpose on the razor's edge,
Now the spear feels light, the bridge feels right,
Twenty men who learned to fight
Not for Sadeas, not for spite,
But for the brother on your left tonight,

[chorus]
I will protect those who cannot protect themselves,
I will protect even those I hate,
Through the storm, through the storm,
We carry the weight,
Bridge Four, Bridge Four,
We carry the weight,

[bridge]
Life before death,
Strength before weakness,
Journey before destination,
Say it with me now,
Life before death,
Strength before weakness,
Journey before destination,

[outro]
And the wind picks up, and the storm rolls in,
And I rise, and I rise, and I rise again

tracks.title: Wretch
tracks.prompt: post-rock hip-hop soul fusion, verse: sparse piano with lo-fi hip-hop beat, introspective spoken word rap with cracking emotion, whispered vocal doubles, 75 BPM, chorus: massive post-rock swell with tremolo guitars building to cathartic peak, strings joining at climax, raw male vocals screaming into reverb, ambient noise between sections like wind through chasms
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
They call me wretch like it's a name I chose,
Like I picked the chains and the bridge crew clothes,
Funny how a word can cut deeper than
Any Shardblade through a hollow man,
I count the dead, I keep the tally straight,
Every man who fell because I came too late,
Every bridge run is a funeral march,
Every sunset just another arch
Over graves I couldn't dig in stone,
So I carry them, carry them, carry them home,

[chorus]
I am the wretch who wouldn't break,
I am the storm they couldn't take,
Rise, rise from the chasm floor,
There is always another door,

[verse 2]
Syl says feel, but feeling is the blade,
Every smile a debt that can't be paid,
The numbness is a fortress, understand,
Depression ain't a choice, it's shifting sand
Beneath the feet of someone trying to stand,
But I stood, yeah I stood on that plateau,
With a side carry and a prayer below,
And something in me said not yet, not yet,
You haven't spoken all the Words yet,

[chorus]
I am the wretch who wouldn't break,
I am the storm they couldn't take,
Rise, rise from the chasm floor,
There is always another door,

[bridge]
The darkness is heavy,
But I have carried heavier,
The darkness is deep,
But I have climbed from deeper,

[outro]
Not yet, not yet, not yet,
I haven't spoken all the Words yet

tracks.title: Bridge Four Cypher
tracks.prompt: post-rock hip-hop soul fusion, crew cypher energy: boom-bap drums with post-rock guitar textures, call-and-response male group vocals trading verses, 95 BPM with half-time feel during instrumental breaks, Mogwai-style crescendo in final chorus, hand claps and stomps as percussion, campfire energy building to arena scale, male vocals energetic and defiant
tracks.lyrics:
[intro]
Bridge Four! Bridge Four!
Who are we? Bridge Four!

[verse 1]
Rock, Teft, Sigzil on the count,
Drehy, Skar, we holding down the mount,
Former slaves with spears and staves,
Digging out the living from the graves,
Lopen lost an arm but not the joke,
Said one-armed Herdazian, that's no hoax,
My cousin's cousin got a cousin who
Could carry bridges better than the whole crew,

[chorus]
We are Bridge Four, branded and burned,
Every scar a lesson we earned,
From the bottom of the chasm to the eye of the storm,
We are Bridge Four, we are reborn,

[verse 2]
Kaladin said stand, so we stood,
Kaladin said fight, so we could,
Not for glory, not for fame,
For the man beside you, learn his name,
Teft, he taught us how to hold a spear,
Sigzil mapped the odds and we're still here,
Moash, yeah Moash, we don't speak that part,
Some bridges burn inside the heart,

[chorus]
We are Bridge Four, branded and burned,
Every scar a lesson we earned,
From the bottom of the chasm to the eye of the storm,
We are Bridge Four, we are reborn,

[bridge]
Brands on our heads,
Winds at our backs,
Stormlight in our veins,
Nothing that we lack,

[outro]
Bridge Four! (Life before death!)
Bridge Four! (Strength before weakness!)
Bridge Four! (Journey before destination!)
Bridge Four forever!

tracks.title: Honor Is Dead
tracks.prompt: post-rock hip-hop soul fusion, dark and defiant: distorted bass and industrial post-rock textures, aggressive rap delivery over dissonant tremolo guitars, 90 BPM half-time feel, chorus erupts into massive Godspeed You Black Emperor wall of sound with screamed vocals, quiet-loud-quiet dynamics extreme, spoken word interlude with solo cello, male vocals intense and furious
tracks.lyrics:
[spoken intro]
Honor is dead,
But I'll see what I can do,

[verse 1]
They dueled for sport while bridgemen died,
Lighteyes in towers, honor is their pride,
But honor's just a word the powerful wield
To justify the bodies on the field,
So I'll take your broken system, crack it wide,
A darkeyes with a Blade and nothing left to hide,
You want a revolution? Start with one man
Who refused to kill according to your plan,

[chorus]
Honor is dead, honor is dead,
But I'll see what I can do instead,
Honor is dead, honor is dead,
So I'll build something new from what they shred,

[verse 2]
Amaram smiled and took my friends away,
Gave himself the Blade and called it a good day,
Branded me a slave so I'd forget the truth,
But memory's the one thing you can't remove,
So honor is dead? Then let it rest,
I'll protect without it, put it to the test,
Not because a code demands I stand,
But because I choose to, Syl in my hand,

[chorus]
Honor is dead, honor is dead,
But I'll see what I can do instead,
Honor is dead, honor is dead,
So I'll build something new from what they shred,

[bridge]
They took the sky from me,
So I became the storm,
They took the light from me,
So I became the dawn,

[outro]
Honor is dead,
Long live honor,
Honor is dead,
Long live honor

tracks.title: Stormblessed
tracks.prompt: post-rock hip-hop soul fusion, triumphant finale: full orchestral post-rock arrangement with hip-hop drums and 808 sub-bass, 100 BPM building tempo, verse: confident flowing rap with melodic hooks, chorus: massive crescendo with layered group vocals chanting over Sigur Ros-style tremolo guitars and soaring strings, gospel choir elements entering in final chorus, euphoric and transcendent, male vocals powerful and free
tracks.lyrics:
[verse 1]
I am the son of Tanavast, storm in my veins,
Fourth Ideal on my lips, freedom in the chains,
Syl beside me luminous, a living spren of honor,
Every bridge I carried made me that much stronger,
From slave to soldier, soldier to knight,
Windrunner ascending in Stormlight,
The Words aren't just spoken, they're lived and they're bled,
I accept that there are those I cannot protect,
And that truth, that truth nearly broke me dead,
But acceptance isn't giving up, hear what I said,

[chorus]
I am Stormblessed, Stormblessed,
Rising where the lightning crest,
I am Stormblessed, Stormblessed,
Wind and rain upon my chest,
Bridge Four, say it with me now,
Stormblessed, Stormblessed,

[verse 2]
The Fourth Ideal cost me everything I had,
Every death I couldn't stop, every loss, every bad
Decision made in darkness when the depression sat
Like a highstorm in my skull, imagine that,
But I spoke the Words, trembling, I spoke them true,
I will accept the ones I cannot rescue,
And the sky opened up like it finally heard,
A broken man made whole by the hardest Words,

[chorus]
I am Stormblessed, Stormblessed,
Rising where the lightning crest,
I am Stormblessed, Stormblessed,
Wind and rain upon my chest,
Bridge Four, say it with me now,
Stormblessed, Stormblessed,

[bridge]
Life before death, I choose to live,
Strength before weakness, I choose to give,
Journey before destination, I choose the road,
And I'll carry every brother's load,

[final chorus]
We are Stormblessed, Stormblessed,
Rising where the lightning crest,
We are Stormblessed, Stormblessed,
All of Bridge Four, forever blessed,
Life before death! (Stormblessed!)
Strength before weakness! (Stormblessed!)
Journey before destination!
Stormblessed!
